life_date: Auguste Louis Lepère, French, Paris 1849–Domme, Dordogne 1918
provenance: [Armstrong Fine Art, Chicago, until 2011; sold in April for AOO, to Drake]; Harry Drake, St. Paul (2011-d. 2012; bequeathed to MIA)
signed: LRC, in the print: [A. LEPERE]; LRC below image, in black: [A Lepère 1/35]; bottom edge right, in pencil: [Garage des Bateaux Omnibus  1886]
title: Riverboat Station
